name: BikeLink Bike Lockers
description: Secure 24/7 bike parking at 5¢/hour at BART stations
fullDescription: BikeLink operates secure electronic bike lockers at BART stations and transit hubs throughout the Bay Area. These on-demand lockers are available 24/7 and rent for just 5 cents per hour.
whatTheyOffer:
- Secure electronic bike lockers at BART stations
- Available 24/7, no reservation needed
- Low cost: 5¢/hour
- Works with BikeLink card ($20 includes $20 credit) or BikeLink app
- Weather-protected storage
howToGetIt:
1. Get a BikeLink card ($20, includes $20 of rental credit)
2. Or download the BikeLink app
3. Find an available locker at any BART station
4. Swipe card or tap phone to lock your bike
5. Same to unlock when returning
keywords: BikeLink, bike locker, secure bike parking, BART, transit, bicycle storage, 5 cents, e-locker, bike commute
